title: Whirlpool 260 L Frost Free Triple Door Refrigerator  (Magnum Steel, FP 283D Protton Roy Magnum Steel (N))

product_specification.Other Features: 2 x Freshness, Moisture Retention Technology, Microblock Technology, Customized Cooling Technology
product_specification.Installation & Demo:
Explain all the functionality of the product
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
Usage of the product
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken

product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Whirlpool
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts, Excluding Air Filter/ Front Grill & Plastic Parts (After Installation). The Warranty Covers Defective Materials and Workmanship From the Date of Purchase. Beyond the First Year of the Warranty Period, Only the Compressor Repair (Excluding Gas Filled Inside the Compressor) Will be Provided Free of Cost for 5 Years From Date of Purchase. Refrigerant Gas is Having Only One Year Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Air Filter/Front Grill is Not Covered in the Warranty After Installation. The Warranty Does Not Cover Installation/Demonstration. Accessories External to the System. Damage parts. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification / Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions That Do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God, While in Transit to Service Centers or Purchaser's Residence.

product_description.Active Fresh Zone: Thanks to the 32 L storage capacity of the Active Fresh Zone, you can store a large number of fruits and vegetables in a single place.
product_description.Energy Efficiency: This refrigerator utilizes lesser energy than a 60-watt CFL bulb, thereby helping you save more on your electricity bills.

review:
Same day installation and demo on the delivery.
The technician was available in our locality so luckily got it done.

First day review. The cooling is amazingly fast.
Spacious indeed. More than satisfactory for a family of four. Should check how the power consumption so far is. The blast freeze option is amazing. Ice cubes formed within 30mins.

Will update the review after a month of usage.
I'd say go for it.
Because it's the only five star rated tripe door fridge in this price segment.

UPDATE AFTER THREE MONTHS OF USAGE :
Electricity bill in our house use to be around 1.8k a month on an average. After switching to this refrigerator, it's lowered down to 1.1k per month. A significant change. Adding to this fridge's power saving, I did change all of my house lightings to 10W LEDs too. Significant saving of an average of 700rs per month on electricity bills.
It's the best fridge at thus price segment. More than enough for a family of four.
Satisfied. 💯

This fridge is really the best at low prices from United States Brand's - Whirlpool. I believe it's really hard to get a good brand of another brand at this price. Its design and its quality are really stunning and superb. It can not be compared to other brands. Simply Awesome!

My Thought About Refrigerator:

On a very local scale, a refrigerator is the center of the universe. On the inside is food essential to life, and on the outside of the door is a summary of the life events of the household.

Got an awesome product with really fast delivery.The only complain I have is with Flipkart. I exchanged my old refrigerator with this product and as soon as the product was delivered my old refrigerator was picked up. The installation would be done by the Whirlpool staff and if we try to do it then the warranty would be void. This means that I was left with no refrigerator for 24 hours. One can imagine how difficult it is nowadays without refrigerator. The process could have been more smooth if the installation would have been done on the same day. Yet, let me describe the product..
The pros of the product:
•Really spacious if you have a family of 4-6 people.
• The space for keeping vegetables separately is a thumbs up.
• I loved the freezer because it's really spacious specially designed for those who keep their freezer loaded with ice cream,cheese and other frozen stuffs.

However, let's also talk about the cons of the product.
• The space provided for keeping water bottles is very less. Only 500-600ml bottles can be kept there. If you have 1ltr. Bottles then you have to keep it in the lower shelf of the fridge.
• The space provided for keeping butter has consumed the space provided for keeping water bottles.
However, you can go for it guys if you want a designer refrigerator at this price. Overall having a good experience.

The refrigerator is quite good and is a new offering from Whirlpool. The refrigerator is supposed to operate without a stabilizer but Whirlpool installation guy will try to sell it. So if the voltage in your area is stable, then there is no need for the stabilizer and the same is clearly mentioned in the manual. Flipkart delivery was flawless and Ekartl guys delivered the product at my doorstep and even placed it in the correct place as requested. For installation, one can wait for Flipkart to arrange the installation or you can directly call Whirlpool customer support aand ask them to arrange the installation. Installation was done on the same day the product was delivered. Will update on the performance of the refrigerator after a month.

This fridge although seems big because of 3 different sections is actually small for a family of 4 adults.
It is good only for a couple and a kid (3 people).
The lower section is unnecessarily big but some people may find it good as they need to store more veggies.
The upper section is also very big and good for couples living in cities as they need to store large amount of frozen food so that it can be used for a few days as no time for cooking in busy life.
The middle section is what disappoints me in this. It has shelves which are very low height and hence can't keep any big vessels in it. Also there is only one door shelf for keeping water bottles and that too you can only keep 2 bottles of 1 litre and not more than that. For keeping 2 more bottles, you need to fold the foldable rack.
For its price the fridge seems to be good, its compact width wise and tall.
But I wish the middle section had less number of shelves but with more height.
